title: Khanindra Chandra Chowdhury
summary: Khanindra Chandra Chowdhury ( UGC, EMERITUS, (retd.) Professor of Mathematics, Gauhati University, ) is an Indian mathematician who is well known for his extensive research work in Pure Mathematics especially in Algebra. His field of interests includes Mathematical Analysis, Graph Theory, Number Theory, Topology, Axiomatic Projective Geometry and Mathematical Logic.
